SELECT a.id, a.title, a.publish_time, a.image, a.profile, b.nickname, a.user, c.visit_count, if(isnull(i.reply), d.comme_count, (d.comme_count+i.reply) ) as comme_count, e.like_count FROM qfeng_article a LEFT JOIN qfeng_user b ON a.user=b.id LEFT JOIN (select article_id, count(1) as visit_count from qfeng_visit_record group by article_id) c ON a.id=c.article_id LEFT JOIN (select article_id, count(1) as comme_count from qfeng_comment where is_delete = 0 group by article_id) d ON a.id = d.article_id LEFT JOIN (select article_id, count(1) as like_count from qfeng_like where is_delete = 0 group by article_id) e ON a.id = e.article_id LEFT JOIN (select g.article_id, count(h.id) as reply from qfeng_comment g left join qfeng_reply h on g.uid = h.comment_id where g.is_delete =0 and h.is_delete=0 group by g.article_id) i ON a.id = i.article_id
RIGHT JOIN (select article_id from qfeng_ref_article_tag where tag = #{tag} where is_delete = 0) f on a.id = f.article_id
WHERE a.is_publish = 1 and a.is_delete =0 ORDER BY
${sortName} ${sortType},
publish_time DESC limit #{pageSize} offset #{page}

SELECT count(1) from qfeng_article a
RIGHT JOIN (select article_id from qfeng_ref_article_tag where tag = #{tag} where is_delete = 0) b on a.id = b.article_id
where a.is_delete =0 and a.is_publish =1
